articles.title: Blockstream debuts Simplicity as Bitcoin’s answer to Ethereum’s Solidity
articles.description: Adam Back’s Blockstream has launched Bitcoin-native smart contract programming language Simplicity, offering an alternative to Ethereum’s Solidity.

articles.title: Ethereum derivatives show no momentum, raising doubts over $4K rally
articles.description: Despite strong ETF inflows, ETH traders remain cautious as competitive pressures and weak network activity persist.

articles.title: White House crypto report a mixed bag for Bitcoin advocates
articles.description: The White House’s crypto report did not provide updates to the March 6 executive order establishing a Bitcoin reserve.

articles.title: The rise of Money2: The next financial system has already begun
articles.description: Money2 is a new financial system powered by stablecoins and DeFi. With $225 billion in stablecoins and code-based contracts replacing banks, Money2 is already changing how value moves.

articles.title: Helium Plus Lets Businesses Join Solana DePIN Project With Just Wi-Fi
articles.description: The Solana DePIN project is launching a new service that allows businesses to contribute to the Helium Network with just Wi-Fi and without having to buy new equipment.

articles.title: Appeals court overturns Nate Chastain's conviction in OpenSea insider trading case
articles.description: Former OpenSea employee Nathaniel Chastain has successfully appealed his conviction for wire fraud and money laundering.

articles.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
articles.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

articles.title: Bitcoin’s quantum threat: Naoris offers bounty to break crypto encryption
articles.description: Naoris has launched a $120,000 bounty incentivising researchers to break key cryptographic algorithms underpinning Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana.

articles.title: Bitcoin is now bigger than Amazon: Here’s how it became a top-5 asset
articles.description: Bitcoin’s explosive July rally pushed its market cap to $2.4 trillion, overtaking Amazon, silver and Alphabet, cementing its place among the world’s five most valuable assets.

articles.title: Crypto for Advisors: Ethereum Just Turned Ten
articles.description: Ethereum turned 10, and Ether’s role as a treasury reserve is growing. Read about current trends.

articles.title: Deutsche Bank-backed EURAU stablecoin launch: Key things to know
articles.description: AllUnity’s EURAU stablecoin launches as euro-denominated stablecoins account for just 0.2% of the stablecoin market despite surging 60% since late 2024.

articles.title: Robinhood's Strong Q2 Fails to Sway Cautious Wall Street Analysts
articles.description: Having nearly tripled in price from the April lows, the stock received a number of modest price target hikes, but no ratings upgrades.

articles.title: 99% of CFOs plan to use crypto long term, 23% within two years: Deloitte
articles.description: A Deloitte survey shows 99% of CFOs at billion-dollar firms expect to adopt crypto long term, with nearly a quarter planning integration within two years.

articles.title: Visa Expands Settlement Platform to Stellar, Avalanche, Adds Support for 3 Stablecoins
articles.description: Visa's platform now supports four stablecoins across four blockchains, including Ethereum and Solana.

articles.title: Stablecoins Speed Up Thanks to ‘AWS of Crypto’ Alchemy’s Latest Upgrade
articles.description: Blockchain infrastructure firm Alchemy has released a punchy upgrade with its new Cortex Engine.

articles.title: ETH Going to $16K in This Cycle? Analyst Explains Why This Could happen
articles.description: Crypto analyst Edward says ether could surge to $15K–$16K this cycle, citing bullish technical patterns, ETF inflows and rising institutional demand.

articles.title: Clearpool Expands to Payments Financing, Debuts Stablecoin Yield Token
articles.description: The decentralized finance platform targets fintechs bridging fiat settlement gaps with short-term stablecoin credit.

articles.title: CoinDesk Indices and SGX Indices launch iEdge CoinDesk Cryptocurrency Indices
articles.description: Institutional-grade benchmarks built for crypto market participation

articles.title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Hedera (HBAR) Gains 7.9% as All Assets Climb Higher
articles.description: Aptos (APT) was also among the top performers, rising 5% from Wednesday.

articles.title: BTC Faces Golden Fibonacci Hurdle at $122K, XRP Holds Support at $3
articles.description: BTC bulls need to overcome the 161.8% Fib extension, the so-called golden ratio.
